data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Yuxi, Yunnan, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yuxi, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 31,475 believers in Yuxi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, encourage the church in Yuxi, Yunnan, China to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Yuxi that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Alu people.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Yuxi, Yunnan, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 414,900 people living in Yuxi, Yunnan, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Yuxi, Yunnan, China, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Yuxi
location.people_groups_list: Huayao Tai, Haoni, Lalu, Xinping, Hongjin Tai, Baihong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Huayao Tai (92,000), Haoni (159,000), Lalu, Xinping (51,000), Hongjin Tai (98,000), Baihong (251,000)
